content: b 2 row with a 2 row with c repeat row 5 8 three times then repeat row 5 and 6 once more do not change color at end of last row turn upper edge with rs facing chain 2 treble_crochet in next single_crochet counts as first tr2tog *double_crochet in next 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet skip next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet in next 2 single_crochet double_crochet in next 2 single_crochet** tr4tog repeat from * 6 more times repeat from * to ** once more tr2tog fasten_off lower edge with rs facing join a with slip_stitch in lower corner of scarf chain 1 working in free loops along opposite side of foundation chain single_crochet in next 2 sts *half_double_crochet in next 2 sts double_crochet in next 2 sts tr4tog double_crochet in next 2 sts half_double_crochet in next 2 sts single_crochet in next st** single_crochet in chain-2 space single_crochet in next 2 sts repeat from * 6 more times repeat from * to ** once more do not fasten_off begin working in rounds trim with rs facing chain 1 single_crochet evenly spaced around entire scarf working 3 single_crochet in each corner join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet fasten_off finishing using yarn needle weave in all ends ©2010 caron international http //www naturallycaron com/projects/aspen/aspen_men_1 html page 2 of 2
